scenario_text.value: Lopmon? You by yourself? Where’s Shuuji?

He gets mad when I’m around. He told me to
get lost.

Oh... Shuuji seems like he’s really
struggling, doesn’t he?

If it were me, I wouldn’t let him out of my
sight.

But didn’t you go off to the shrine on your
own earlier?
Yup! There was something I just had to find!

I got so excited thinking about it, I took
right off!
But I made sure to tell Takuma I was going!
You never told me where, though.
You two get along so well.

(Lopmon seems really unhappy about his
relationship with Shuuji.)

(I feel like if this keeps up, something bad
is going to happen.)

(I really wish they’d start getting along
better soon.)

You and Agumon get along so well, Takuma. I’m
jealous...
